description: Classic chocolate chip cookies with a crispy edge and chewy center.
instructions: Cream together butter and sugars until light and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into butter mixture until blended.
Drop by spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges are golden.
